summary: I'm Do Dinh Anh, a web developer with 2 years of experience in JavaScript and .NET technologies, with good knowledge of Object-Oriented and Design Patterns. Learning new languages and technologies is what I’m really keen on. I’m considered a teamplayer because I prefer to discuss innovative ideas with others and tend to work well within the group.

projects.projectDescription: An enhanced experience video system. It attracts creators and makers to join the system so that they can improve, contribute to it and then viewers can enjoy and wind down whenever they want.
projects.responsibilities: Communicate with customers and teammates to clarify requirements. Develop key modules of the system that saved around 20% of the development time of other functionalities
projects.technologies: ReactJS, Redux, Webpack, Sass, Ant Design

projects.projectDescription: Develop a local desktop application, it’s one of a system lies in a huge ecosystem of the organization that is taking up 60% of finance in the Japanese market and manages tons of documents and links related to that field.
projects.responsibilities: Analyze specifications and recommend the best solutions to the customer. Design screens and build up features based on requirements
projects.technologies: WPF, WCF, Telerik UI, Oracle Database

projects.projectDescription: Dealing with the client side of a firing alarm system so that the customer can completely be in control of problems accurately.
projects.responsibilities: Communicate with customers and teammates to report daily works. Build up features and implement unit tests based on requirements
projects.technologies: ReactJS, Redux, Saga, ImmutableJS, Reselect, Jest

projects.projectDescription: Develop a sale and customer management system. Which has highly complicated kind of banking business.
projects.responsibilities: Build screens according to specifications. Interact data across sophisticatedly existing services. Write test cases and execute them

projects.projectDescription: Develop a mobile landing system. To better assist customers that can quickly give options and select suitable mobile phones conveniently.
projects.responsibilities: Exchanging with customers to get clear requirements. Compose APIs and evolve modules of the system.
projects.technologies: Angular 2, HTML, CSS, ASP.NET WebAPI, Microsoft SQL

projects.projectDescription: A meeting management website can support you to book customer's appointments with anyone whenever they want, from wherever you are!
projects.responsibilities: Meeting with customers and teammates to get clear requirements. Develop the frameworks and modules of the system.

education.learningIn: Posts and Telecommunications Institute of Technology, Vietnam
